answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!The symptoms can be due to side effects of certain medications. So stop this drug and see if it helps. It can also be due to fibromyalgia, Vit D or Vit B12 deficiency or peripheral neuropathy of diabetes and hypothyroidism. A pinched nerve can also be the cause. Lyme’s disease is another possibility.Since I cannot examine you and know other related conditions you may be having, nor is a detailed history possible on net, I have listed the various possibilities that should be looked into. Please consult your PCP for primary examination followed by proper referral.Take care!

question: I read on the forum that several other people had very similar symptoms as I am. I am wondering if they have found out anything. Sounds like most of our doctors are misdiagnosing or say we're fine...This discussion is related to/posts/show/974044.
title: Irregular heartbeat, shooting pains throughout body, cramps in legs and arms, neck and jaw pain..
